member.name: M:StarboundMaterials.frmMain.UpdateStatus(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Update the status and progress bar. Cross-thread safe.
member.param: Status text, or null char to not update status.
Progress percentage (0-100), or less than zero to not update progress.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
